TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, you can't stop and you die from exhaustion.

I wish for infinite money.

Granted. Every currency collapses and is now worthless. Everyone one starts riots and raids other buildings. There are no more countries with economic stability. People starve, are murdered and die off. There are wars fighting over raw resources. There are only one billion people left. There no longer is any rapid technological progression. They must restart. You are now deceased, and thus the wish is no longer valid. Within a few generations, the humans slowly regain their steps. Only, the calamities caused by the previous branch of humans already have progressed too far. They were on the brink of the revolution of efficient renewable energy, and hadn't much time to put them in place. The newer humans went in the same direction as us, and baked themselves to death because of the already existing off-balamce climates and ecosystems. They're are dead now. All because of you.

------------------------------------------------------------------

I wish that we'd solve the Fermi Paradox.

Done. We find that there are no aliens. All because of you. (Wow the consequences of my wish are dark)

I wish for KSP Gamer's Edition.

Granted, but its on fire

I wish i had ksp best ssto in real life

Granted, it fails and crashes with YOU in it.

I wish for chocolate cookies and cream ice cream.

Granted. Dry ice.

I wish I knew what the planetary coordinate system used as the 0,0 reference point.

Granted, but you forget and never remember that planets exist in the first place.

I wish for a cat phone case.

granted, its an alive cat with a phone sticked on its organs

I wish i had a scramjet

Granted, but the US gov't seizes it, for FREEDUM.

I wish for oranges.

Granted, they're moldy.

I wish for me to be a mod

Granted. You're not a good one and a troll gets you.

I wish to have one avatar for every forum account I have.

granted, they re all yaoi

I wish i had a button that nukes what im thinking

granted, they re all yaoi

I wish i had a button that nukes what im thinking

Granted. You think of your Mom, and she dies.

I wish for a button that gets rid of things I hate or don't want.

Granted. After a faulty start it works on itself.

I wish for infinite genies.

Granted. All of them are you from the future, and you get turned into one of them. You can only grant other people's wishes now.

I wish for space to be blue.

Granted, it is Cyan!

I wish I had a girlfriend!

Granted. Hi...

I wish I could see your reaction to that.

Granted. I, however, am reactionless to your wish.

I wish for liquid fuel and oxidizer all over me.

That made me jump!

- - - Updated - - -

I wish i could see your reaction to that.

Granted. You must die because all the answers are on my face.

I wish to run in the 90s.

Granted. Say goodbye to fast internet, KSP and these forums. Oh, and did I mention that a new laptop is going to cost you a fortune?

I wish for a mainframe.

granted, but its on fireÃ‚Â²

I wish i had all the knowledge on google datacenter

Granted, you get Alzheimers and forget everything.

I wish I had a Youtube account.

granted, but its banned

I wish i could summon the food i want

Granted. Although you have the power, you cannot use it as per the laws of physics.

I wish I could build a faster plane.
